mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_reg_date, b.board_view, b.category_code, b.member_id, b.board_file1, c.category_name AS categoryName FROM board b JOIN category c ON b.category_code = c.category_code WHERE b.category_code = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY b.board_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_reg_date = NOW(), category_code = #{categoryCode} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_reg_date, b.board_view, b.category_code, b.member_id, b.board_file1, c.category_name FROM board b JOIN category c ON b.category_code = c.category_code WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_content, board_reg_date, board_view, category_code, member_id, board_file1 ) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW(), #{boardView}, #{categoryCode}, #{memberId}, #{boardFile1} )
